item.title: 주노플로 - Eyes On Me (Feat.G-Soul,도끼)
item.description:

about this moment
Long
as I’m livin’

every time

that they miss him

on that la la la

I’m coming up

babe

your eyes
눈앞의 모든 걸
잡아
So throw it up
hands in the air
Open your eyes
your eyes
모둘 위해
gotta make it

hands in the air baby
Yeah
you already know
Better keep
your eyes on me
여기 모든 eyes
on me
So throw it up
hands in the air baby
Yeah
you already know

your eyes on me

on me

you

in ya section

But I’m still living

막을 수 없는
나의 앞길은

if you say it

about it

Cuz you lames always
